mapper.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_COMP, BOOK_LOC, ISBN FROM BOOK
and book_Title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Comp like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY BOOK_TITLE ) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} and #{last}

SELECT ISBN, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONT, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_COMP, BOOK_GENRE, BOOK_AMOUNT, BOOK_LOC, DUE_DATE, BOOK_IMG FROM (SELECT B.ISBN, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_CONT, B.BOOK_WRITER, B.BOOK_COMP, BOOK_IMG, B.BOOK_GENRE, B.BOOK_AMOUNT, B.BOOK_LOC, TO_CHAR(R.DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')AS DUE_DATE FROM RENTAL R, BOOK B WHERE R.ISBN = B.ISBN AND R.DUE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(DUE_DATE) FROM RENTAL WHERE ISBN = #{isbn}) UNION SELECT B.ISBN, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_CONT, B.BOOK_WRITER, B.BOOK_COMP, BOOK_IMG, B.BOOK_GENRE, B.BOOK_AMOUNT, B.BOOK_LOC, TO_CHAR(R.DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')AS DUE_DATE FROM RENTAL R, BOOK B WHERE R.ISBN(+) = B.ISBN AND B.ISBN = #{isbn}) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK
and book_Title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Comp like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
